titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of a "Faith and Defiance Day," honoring the victims of the July 13th, 2024 shooting, condemning political violence, and acknowledging the positive impact President Donald J. Trump has had on America.

A resolution expressing support for the designation of a "Faith and Defiance Day," honoring the victims of the July 13th, 2024 shooting, condemning political violence, and acknowledging the positive impact President Donald J. Trump has had on America.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
